title: Let's Talk About The Graphics
body:
So seeing as League is coming to Mobile and 'Console' they of course would have to modernize the graphics abit.

But seeing as what was given to us so far, it leads me to believe the mobile port is going to look better than the PC port. (Yes I know it's not a port technically) So why should league on PC look like a cheap mobile game when league on mobile look like a slightly better mobile game? Surely there's a way we could make the game look better on PC right?

(Edit: I play in 1440p Max Settings)
